protocol_name: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
protocol_name_html: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
description:
This protocol is for the whole genome de novo assembly and annotation for apostichopus japonicus genome, but can be useful in other marine invertebrate genomes. It accompanies the following GigaScience publication:

 

Jihoon Jo, et al.  (2016): Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. GigaScience...
protocol_affiliation: School of Biological Sciences and Technology, Chonnam National University
manuscript_citation: Jihoon Jo, Jooseong Oh, Hyun-Gwan Lee, Hyun-Hee Hong, Sung-Gwon Lee, Seongmin Cheon, Elizabeth M. A. Kern, Soyeong Jin, Sung-Jin Cho, Joong-Ki Park, Chungoo Park; Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. Gigascience 2017; 6 (1): 1-6. doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giw006

components.data: Run Trimmomatic and "Trim Galore" with input files of all Illumina raw-reads.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run Trimmomatic and "Trim Galore" with input files of all Illumina raw-reads.

components.data: Run ALLPATHS-LG for correcing errors in the raw illumina sequences
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run ALLPATHS-LG for correcing errors in the raw illumina sequences

components.data: Run Platanus for de-novo genome assembly
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run Platanus for de-novo genome assembly

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
source_data.protocol_name: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
source_data.annotation: You should compare the performance of assemblers such as SOAPdenovo, ALLPATHS-LG
source_data.thread_text: You should compare the performance of assemblers such as SOAPdenovo, ALLPATHS-LG
source_data.body: You should compare the performance of assemblers such as SOAPdenovo, ALLPATHS-LG

components.data: Run GapCloser (a module of SOAPdenovo2) for gap closing of the gaps that still remained in the resulting scaffolds
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run GapCloser (a module of SOAPdenovo2) for gap closing of the gaps that still remained in the resulting scaffolds

components.data: Run RepeatMasker using the Repbase TE library and de novo repeat library constructed by Repeat Modeler
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run RepeatMasker using the Repbase TE library and de novo repeat library constructed by Repeat Modeler

components.data: Perform the ab-initio gene prediction using AUGUSTUS using hints from splicing alignment of transcripts to the repeat-masked assembled genome with BLAT and PASA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Perform the ab-initio gene prediction using AUGUSTUS using hints from splicing alignment of transcripts to the repeat-masked assembled genome with BLAT and PASA.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
source_data.protocol_name: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
source_data.protocol_name_html: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
source_data.annotation: You must collect the RNA-seq data for obtaing AUGUSTUS training set
source_data.thread_text: You must collect the RNA-seq data for obtaing AUGUSTUS training set
source_data.body: You must collect the RNA-seq data for obtaing AUGUSTUS training set

components.data: Map the homologous proteins in other species (from Unoprot) to the repeat-masked assembled genome using tBLASTn with an E-value < 1 x 10-5
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Map the homologous proteins in other species (from Unoprot) to the repeat-masked assembled genome using tBLASTn with an E-value < 1 x 10-5

components.data: Predict the gene in the aligned sequences in Step9 using GeneWise to search for precise spliced alignment and gene structure.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Predict the gene in the aligned sequences in Step9 using GeneWise to search for precise spliced alignment and gene structure.

components.data: Map RNA-seq reads to the repeat-masked assembled genome using TopHat, and build the homology-based gene model using Cufflinks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Map RNA-seq reads to the repeat-masked assembled genome using TopHat, and build the homology-based gene model using Cufflinks.

components.data: Intergrate all gene set in Step 8-11 without redundant gene set.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Intergrate all gene set in Step 8-11 without redundant gene set.
